name: Etherborn - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The Etherborn Original Soundtrack by Gabriel Garrido García and Altered Matter.

An hour of original live-recorded music, featuring:
  • the complete score from the game
  • additional musical pieces
  • music sheets

Track list:

OST

---
1. Main Title
2. Birth
3. The Endless Tree - First Vision
4. The Endless Tree - Second Vision
5. The Endless Tree - Third Vision
6. The Endless Tree - Fourth Vision
7. Shapes of a Memory - The First Memory
8. Shapes of a Memory - Discovering
9. Shapes of a Memory - Remembrance
10. Shapes of a Memory - Back to the Endless
11. Desert of the Mind
12. Structured Thoughts
13. The Longing of the Stones
14. The Yellow Room
15. Ending
16. Credits

B-Sides
-------
17. Main Title (Second Version)
18. Shapes of a Memory (Part B)
19. Announcement Trailer
20. Rebirth Trailer
21. Launch Trailer

Credits

Music Composition & Orchestration - Gabriel Garrido García


Recorded & Mixed in Abuelita Studios.

Violin I - Sara Balasch Lozano
Violin II - Ernest Martinez Solà
Viola - Pepi Izquierdo Martínez
Cello - Marta Pons García

Clarinet - Raül Verdú Sellés
Bassoon - Carlos Martín Esteve

Soprano - Flavia Camacho Martínez

Mixer Engineer - Stefano Maccarrone
Mixer Engineer - Maria Salnikova
Recording Engineer - Dan Hammond
Studio Assistant - Matias Lizana García


All music files provided in WAV format. Music sheets provided in PDF format.
Files will download in your Etherborn folder in the Steam library (...\steamapps\common\Etherborn\Original Soundtrack).

supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
